channel.title: Client Help ? Probally Easy Lol :/ x
channel.description:
When I Open DannyScape V1.1 Client And Click The Start The 'cmd' Thing Comes Up Like Normall And The Goes Of Stright Away. Aftr 0.5 Seconds Or Less, When I Edit The 'Play Now' Batch File This Is What It Says :
@echo off cd Client Files start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
Any Help Getting This Work Will Be Brilliant !
Thanks

item.title: Client Help ? Probally Easy Lol :/ x
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

Take off the ‘exit’ and replace it with ‘pause’.
Credits to I Vain I: You should take off the w in javaw…
Or you could just put the ‘pause’ before the exit.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help ? Probally Easy Lol :/ x

item.description:
@clarkie1122 wrote:

When I Open DannyScape V1.1 Client And Click The Start The ‘cmd’ Thing Comes Up Like Normall And The Goes Of Stright Away. Aftr 0.5 Seconds Or Less, When I Edit The ‘Play Now’ Batch File This Is What It Says :

@echo off
cd Client Files
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Any Help Getting This Work Will Be Brilliant !

Thanks
